text: @Kpop_Herald @modooborahae @BigHitEnt He went a week BEFORE and before the whole COVID-19 shit that happened people were walking around in South Korea like there was no virus, even the clubs and bars were open. There was NO enforced rule of Social Distancing like in other countries. These companies need to STOP NOW

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
